name: The Maze of Rhythm
description:
The Maze of Rhythm is combining between Rhythm and Maze game. It’s a redesign of linear rhythm gameplay to has more variety, player’s choice, adaptive gameplay experience. Rather than keep playing on a linear narrative, players can choose their own routes to complete the Maze, also they can use reward orb to upgrade their weapon/skills to suit their playing styles.

Credits:

  • Made by Wish Jiravitianr / Game Designer, Artist, Scripter
  • Instuctor: Jason Weezner
  • Made in GAM 606: Rapid Game Development

Platform/System:

  • Built in Unity
  • For Windows PC
